email.subject: Diary
email.body:
Got it! Finally got it!
That location file is a key to finally kill that motherfucker! Slayer has connections And once we will get all details Then I can kill Omicron
I need to make sure it will be bloody as possible Fucker must suffer...
NightHawks should help They are power drunk And easily manipulated now I have to use it in my advantage
Should go back to the IRC...
